name: Fun Frog
description:
Explore a vast, open, and exciting world with Frog in the laid back platformer! With a friend by your side and some crystals in your pocket, you can go anywhere and explore everything in this game!

SPOILER BELOW!

This is an entry for the Absurd Game Jam. It is only 1 looping tutorial, humiliating bad tutorials. That is the whole point of the game, and everything else on this page is meant to help trick the player into thinking there is an actual game to be played.
